data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Trolls, Lizardmen and Rockmen Characters (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This token pack contains 20 tokens: This set contains a variety of Troll, Lizardmen/Dragonmen and Rockmen characters. Great for PC's NPC's and enemies.

This token pack includes:

  • Half Dragon
  • Half Dragon High Priest
  • Half Dragon Diplomat
  • Half Dragon Merchant
  • Half Dragon Pirate
  • Half Dragon Wizard
  • Orc Princess
  • Rockman
  • Rockman Priest
  • Rockman Jade
  • Rockman Peasant
  • Rockman Scout
  • Rockman Wrestler
  • Troll Warlord
  • Troll Demon
  • Troll Fighter
  • 2 Troll Waitress
  • Troll Wizard

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
